bibl.title: Ancient Lamps in the Royal Ontario Museum. I. Greek and Roman Clay Lamps. A Catalogue. With photographs by W.B. Robertson et alii.
bibl.note: More than 120 of the ROM's "Fayoum" lamps were illustrated by Petrie in Roman Ehnasya, 1905.
bibl.seg: Hayes John W., Ancient Lamps in the Royal Ontario Museum. I. Greek and Roman Clay Lamps. A Catalogue. With photographs by W.B. Robertson et alii.
Toronto, Royal Ontario Museum, 1980, 4Â°, xiv-226 pp., 68 pll.
More than 120 of the ROM's "Fayoum" lamps were illustrated by Petrie in Roman Ehnasya, 1905.
